typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	hubName as string,
	satName as string,
	hashVal as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*']) ~> DataVaultSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBSource
DataVaultSource derive(hashID = sha2(256, byName($hashVal))) ~> hashKeys
hashKeys select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectHubCols
Exists1 alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
SelectHubCols, DataVaultSource exists(hashID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
HUBSource derive(targethub = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> TargetHubID
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HubLoad
